title: Rife Golf Roll Groove Technology Series Right Handed Red RG7 Full Exotic Mallet Putter Precision Milled Face Edge and Cavity Ensures an Ideal Weight Balance
features: Full Exotic Mallet Design Head Style, Small Shaft Over Offset Shaft Neck for Unobstructed View of Golf Ball on Contact
Red PVD Plated Non-Glare Head Finish
Famous Roll Groove Technology Precision Milled Face Scorelines
Milled Top Edge And Cavity For Exacting Head Weight
Dual NON-Adjustable Sole Weights Enhance Perfect Balance For Putting Control
description: Since 1996, Rife Golf has been creating quality golf equipment for Professional Tour Players, Intermediate Golfers and the Weekend Warrior. In fact, in that time, Rife Golf has achieved over 50 Tour wins and Rife Golf has been in the bag of a European Tour Order of Merit winner, a PGA Tour money list winner and several Ryder Cup players. With a design & engineering team of more than 100 years of combined golf experience, Rife Golf continues to design the world’s finest premium golf club equipment using innovative methods, new materials, and concepts focused on creating clubs that perform on the game’s highest level. ROLL GROOVE TECHNOLOGY FACE SCORELINES WITH 2 DEGREES OF LOFT HAS MADE RIFE PUTTERS FAMOUS ON ALL WORLD TOURS SINCE THE COMPANY STARTED IN 1996. WITH THE FACE LOFT OF ONLY 2 DEGREES, WHEN THE GOLF BALL IS STRUCK IT IMMEDIATELY STARTS TO OVER-ROLL TOWARD THE TARGET INSTEAD OF SKIDDING AT IMPACT AND POSSIBLY THROWING THE BALL OFF ITS INTENDED TARGET LINE. RIFE IS THE ONLY PUTTER COMPANY THAT USES 2 DEGREES OF LOFT FOR ALL ITS PUTTERS MAKING IT UNIQUE IN THE WORLD MARKET AND EVERY GOLFERS DREAM. WE SAY “RIFE4LIFE” MEANING OUR PUTTERS ARE THE LAST ANY GOLFER WILL NEED! RIFE PUTTER HEADCOVER INCLUDED. Loft: 2D, Lie: 70D, Head Weight: 360 Grams, Head Material: 304 Stainless, Offset: 3/4 Shaft, Putter Grip: Rife Midsize Pistol Style
